doc.title: Pantyhose Tie Ups 1
doc.plot: Three fabulous actresses are bound and gagged in their silky pantyhose. Luscious Nina is chair tied, hogtied, and then spread-eagled, sometimes in a bra, sometimes topless. She is tape-gagged then pantyhose gagged on camera. Pretty Kelly (Jennifer Simon) is bound on a bed. Then, nude, she is tied with both arms in one pantyhose leg, both legs in the other. A pantyhose gag is applied on camera and she is left helpless. She gives a great, realistic performance. Brooke is a secretary tied and gagged in a chair in pantyhose and bra. Hogtied on a desk, she's left to be found in this humiliating situation.
